title: Onboard a New Supplier
description: A company decides to start working with a new supplier. An agent must set them up in the system.

tasks.description: Gather the new supplier's information, including contact details, payment terms, and product catalog.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary supplier data.

tasks.description: Create a new supplier record in the procurement system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new supplier account.

tasks.description: Upload the supplier's product catalog and pricing into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new products to the company's catalog.
